spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified primarily as High-Energy & Intense due to the use of 'Tabata' and 'HIIT' in the title and description, indicating a fast-paced, intense workout. The structure of 12 sprints with high effort (20s/10s) explicitly supports this classification, earning a score of 0.9.

Flow & Rhythm is another present aspect due to the inclusion of rhythm-based spinning and tags like 'rhythm spin' and 'rhythm cycling', implying a music-driven and continuous movement, giving it a score of 0.6.

Additionally, the workout is also Structured & Disciplined, as it follows a specific protocol of warm-up, set intervals (Tabata), and cool-down, showing a well-organized plan. The description mentioning an 8-week spin program for beginners to build endurance suggests a structured progression, awarding it a score of 0.7.

The video does not relate to Soothing & Restorative or Outdoor & Adventure due to the intense and indoor nature, nor does it focus on Sport & Agility, as it lacks sports-specific techniques.
